00067 BatteryChargerControl::BatteryChargerControl(AcqUnit* u,QWidget* parent)
00068                                            : QDialog(parent)
00069 {
00070     unit = u;
00072     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.setupUi(this);
00073     saveFile = "";
00074 // Disable a bunch of controls until the save file has been opened.
00075     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.downloadButton->setEnabled(false);
00076     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.closeFileButton->setEnabled(false);
00077     on_acquireButton_clicked();
00078 }

00081 {
00082 }

00089 {
00090     accept();
00091 }

00104 void BatteryChargerControl::on_acquireButton_clicked()
00105 {
00106     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.errorLabel->clear();
00107     unsigned char stateVariables[20];
00108     unsigned char numberBytes;
00109     unsigned char numberChannels = unit->getNumberChannels();
00110     bool ok = unit->getStateVariables(0,stateVariables,numberBytes);
00111     AcqSimpleAdcUnit* panelVoltageUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,0);
00112     if (panelVoltageUnit->isConfigured())
00113     {
00114         solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.panelVoltageDisplay->setVisible(true);
00115 // Pull in a value for the panel voltage
00116         int panelVoltageSample = stateVariables[0]+(stateVariables[1] << 8);
00117         unsigned char precision = 2;
00118         if (ok)
00119         {
00120             unsigned char adcPrecision  = panelVoltageUnit->getAdcPrecision();
00121             float mulScaleFactor = panelVoltageUnit->getMulScaleFactor();
00122             float offScaleFactor = panelVoltageUnit->getOffScaleFactor();
00123             if (offScaleFactor > 32568) offScaleFactor -= 65536;
00124             float averageValue = ((panelVoltageSample*mulScaleFactor)/(1<<adcPrecision)
00125                                     +offScaleFactor)/655.36;
00126             solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.panelVoltageDisplay->display(QString("%1")
00127                           .arg(averageValue,5,'f',precision));
00128         }
00129         else
00130         {
00131             displayErrorMessage(panelVoltageUnit->error());
00132             solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.panelVoltageDisplay->display(QString("Error"));
00133         }
00134     }
00135     else solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.panelVoltageDisplay->setVisible(false);
00136     AcqSimpleAdcUnit* batteryVoltageUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,1);
00137     if (batteryVoltageUnit->isConfigured())
00138     {
00139         solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.batteryVoltageDisplay->setVisible(true);
00140 // Pull in a value for the battery voltage
00141         int batteryVoltageSample = stateVariables[2]+(stateVariables[3] << 8);
00142         unsigned char precision = 2;
00143         if (ok)
00144         {
00145             unsigned char adcPrecision  = batteryVoltageUnit->getAdcPrecision();
00146             float mulScaleFactor = batteryVoltageUnit->getMulScaleFactor();
00147             float offScaleFactor = batteryVoltageUnit->getOffScaleFactor();
00148             if (offScaleFactor > 32568) offScaleFactor -= 65536;
00149             float averageValue = ((batteryVoltageSample*mulScaleFactor)/(1<<adcPrecision)
00150                                     +offScaleFactor)/655.36;
00151             solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.batteryVoltageDisplay->display(QString("%1")
00152                           .arg(averageValue,5,'f',precision));
00153         }
00154         else
00155         {
00156             displayErrorMessage(batteryVoltageUnit->error());
00157             solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.batteryVoltageDisplay->display(QString("Error"));
00158         }
00159     }
00160     else solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.batteryVoltageDisplay->setVisible(false);
00161     AcqSimpleAdcUnit* loadCurrentUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,2);
00162     if (loadCurrentUnit->isConfigured())
00163     {
00164         solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.loadCurrentDisplay->setVisible(true);
00165 // Pull in a value for the load current
00166         int loadCurrentSample = stateVariables[4]+(stateVariables[5] << 8);
00167         unsigned char precision = 2;
00168         if (ok)
00169         {
00170             unsigned char adcPrecision  = loadCurrentUnit->getAdcPrecision();
00171             float mulScaleFactor = loadCurrentUnit->getMulScaleFactor();
00172             float offScaleFactor = loadCurrentUnit->getOffScaleFactor();
00173             if (offScaleFactor > 32568) offScaleFactor -= 65536;
00174             float averageValue = ((loadCurrentSample*mulScaleFactor)/(1<<adcPrecision)
00175                                     +offScaleFactor)/655.36;
00176             solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.loadCurrentDisplay->display(QString("%1")
00177                           .arg(averageValue,5,'f',precision));
00178         }
00179         else
00180         {
00181             displayErrorMessage(loadCurrentUnit->error());
00182             solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.loadCurrentDisplay->display(QString("Error"));
00183         }
00184     }
00185     else solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.loadCurrentDisplay->setVisible(false);
00186     AcqSimpleAdcUnit* panelCurrentUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,3);
00187     if (panelCurrentUnit->isConfigured())
00188     {
00189         solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.panelCurrentDisplay->setVisible(true);
00190 // Pull in a value for the panel current
00191         int panelCurrentSample = stateVariables[6]+(stateVariables[7] << 8);
00192         unsigned char precision = 2;
00193         if (ok)
00194         {
00195             unsigned char adcPrecision  = panelCurrentUnit->getAdcPrecision();
00196             float mulScaleFactor = panelCurrentUnit->getMulScaleFactor();
00197             float offScaleFactor = panelCurrentUnit->getOffScaleFactor();
00198             if (offScaleFactor > 32568) offScaleFactor -= 65536;
00199             float averageValue = ((panelCurrentSample*mulScaleFactor)/(1<<adcPrecision)
00200                                     +offScaleFactor)/655.36;
00201             solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.panelCurrentDisplay->display(QString("%1")
00202                           .arg(averageValue,5,'f',precision));
00203         }
00204         else
00205         {
00206             displayErrorMessage(panelCurrentUnit->error());
00207             solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.panelCurrentDisplay->display(QString("Error"));
00208         }
00209     }
00210     else solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.panelCurrentDisplay->setVisible(false);
00211 }

00213 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00220 void BatteryChargerControl::on_uploadButton_clicked()
00221 {
00222     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.errorLabel->clear();
00223     unit->bootloaderJump();
00225     AvrSerialProg* bootloaderForm = new AvrSerialProg(unit->getPort(),this);
00226     bootloaderForm->exec();
00228     unit->synchronize(100);
00229     displayErrorMessage(unit->error());
00230 }
00231 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00237 void BatteryChargerControl::on_configureButton_clicked()
00238 {
00239     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.errorLabel->clear();
00240     BatteryChargerConfigure configureForm(unit);
00241     configureForm.exec();
00242     displayErrorMessage(unit->error());
00243 }
00244 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00250 void BatteryChargerControl::on_aboutButton_clicked()
00251 {
00252     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.errorLabel->clear();
00253     BatteryChargerAbout aboutForm(unit);
00254     aboutForm.exec();
00255     displayErrorMessage(unit->error());
00256 }
00257 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00269 void BatteryChargerControl::on_downloadButton_clicked()
00270 {
00271     unsigned char resultBuffer[65536];
00272     unsigned int startPointer = 0;
00273     unsigned int endPointer = 0;
00274     unsigned int length = 0;
00275     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.errorLabel->clear();
00276     bool ok;
00278     if (saveFile.isEmpty())
00279     {
00280         displayErrorMessage("Output File not defined");
00281         return;
00282     }
00283     if (! outFile->isOpen())
00284     {
00285         displayErrorMessage("Output File not open");
00286         return;
00287     }
00289     if (solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.offlineCheckBox->isChecked())
00290     {
00291         ok = unit->sendDataBufferRead(resultBuffer,0x08,0x0C,
00292                               unit->getMaxBlockLength(),length);
00293         startPointer = (unsigned int)(resultBuffer[0] +
00294                                     (resultBuffer[1]<<8));
00295         endPointer   = (unsigned int)(resultBuffer[2] +
00296                                     (resultBuffer[3]<<8));
00297     }
00300     else
00301     {
00302         ok = unit->sendResetBufferPointers(startPointer,endPointer);
00303         if (ok)
00304         {
00305             if ((startPointer < 16) && (endPointer < 16))
00306             {
00307                 displayErrorMessage("Invalid Pointers - use Offline Mode");
00308                 return;
00309             }
00310         }
00311     }
00313     float rtcTickMs =
00314             (float)(unit->getRtcFactor(unit->getRtcScale())*256)/
00315             (float)unit->getCpuFreq();
00318     if (ok)
00319         ok = unit->sendDataBufferRead(resultBuffer,startPointer,endPointer,
00320                                       unit->getMaxBlockLength(),length);
00322     if (ok)
00323     {
00324         AcqSimpleAdcUnit* panelVoltageUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,0);
00325         unsigned char adcPrecisionPV  = panelVoltageUnit->getAdcPrecision();
00326         unsigned int mulScaleFactorPV = panelVoltageUnit->getMulScaleFactor();
00327         unsigned int offScaleFactorPV = panelVoltageUnit->getOffScaleFactor();
00328         AcqSimpleAdcUnit* batteryVoltageUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,1);
00329         unsigned char adcPrecisionBV  = batteryVoltageUnit->getAdcPrecision();
00330         unsigned int mulScaleFactorBV = batteryVoltageUnit->getMulScaleFactor();
00331         unsigned int offScaleFactorBV = batteryVoltageUnit->getOffScaleFactor();
00332         AcqSimpleAdcUnit* loadCurrentUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,2);
00333         unsigned char adcPrecisionLC  = loadCurrentUnit->getAdcPrecision();
00334         unsigned int mulScaleFactorLC = loadCurrentUnit->getMulScaleFactor();
00335         unsigned int offScaleFactorLC = loadCurrentUnit->getOffScaleFactor();
00336         AcqSimpleAdcUnit* panelCurrentUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,3);
00337         unsigned char adcPrecisionPC  = panelCurrentUnit->getAdcPrecision();
00338         unsigned int mulScaleFactorPC = panelCurrentUnit->getMulScaleFactor();
00339         int offScaleFactorPC = panelCurrentUnit->getOffScaleFactor();
00340         if (offScaleFactorPC > 64500) offScaleFactorPC -= 65536;
00341         QTextStream out(outFile);
00342         unsigned int n=0;
00343         while (n<length)
00344         {
00345             unsigned long time = (unsigned long)(resultBuffer[n] +
00346                                                (resultBuffer[n+1]<<8)) +
00347                                ((unsigned long)(resultBuffer[n+2] +
00348                                                (resultBuffer[n+3]<<8))<<16);
00349             int panelVoltageSample = (int)(resultBuffer[n+4] +
00350                                                (resultBuffer[n+5]<<8));
00351             if (panelVoltageSample > 64500) panelVoltageSample -= 65536;
00352             int batteryVoltageSample = (int)(resultBuffer[n+6] +
00353                                                (resultBuffer[n+7]<<8));
00354             if (batteryVoltageSample > 64500) batteryVoltageSample -= 65536;
00355             int loadCurrentSample = (int)(resultBuffer[n+8] +
00356                                                (resultBuffer[n+9]<<8));
00357             if (loadCurrentSample > 64500) loadCurrentSample -= 65536;
00358             int panelCurrentSample = (int)(resultBuffer[n+10] +
00359                                                (resultBuffer[n+11]<<8));
00360             if (panelCurrentSample > 64500) panelCurrentSample -= 65536;
00361             bool scaled = true;
00362             out << startTime.addMSecs(time*rtcTickMs).time().toString("hh:mm:ss")
00363                 << ",";
00364             if (! scaled)
00365             {
00366                 out << ((panelVoltageSample*mulScaleFactorPV)/(1<<adcPrecisionPV)+offScaleFactorPV)/655.36 << ","
00367                     << ((batteryVoltageSample*mulScaleFactorBV)/(1<<adcPrecisionBV)+offScaleFactorBV)/655.36 << ","
00368                     << ((loadCurrentSample*mulScaleFactorLC)/(1<<adcPrecisionLC)+offScaleFactorLC)/655.36 << ","
00369                     << ((panelCurrentSample*mulScaleFactorPC)/(1<<adcPrecisionPC)+offScaleFactorPC)/655.36;
00370             }
00371             else
00372             {
00373                 out << panelVoltageSample/655.36 << "," << batteryVoltageSample/655.36 << ","
00374                     << loadCurrentSample/655.36 << "," << panelCurrentSample/655.36;
00375             }
00376                 out << endl;
00377             n += 16;
00378         }
00379     }
00380     if (! ok) displayErrorMessage(unit->error());
00381 }
00382 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00386 void BatteryChargerControl::on_saveFileButton_clicked()
00387 {
00389     if (! saveFile.isEmpty())
00390     {
00391         displayErrorMessage("A file is already open - close it first");
00392         return;
00393     }
00394     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.errorLabel->clear();
00395     QString filename = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
00396                         "Save Acquired Data",
00397                         QString(),
00398                         "Comma Separated Variables (*.csv)",0,
00399                         QFileDialog::DontConfirmOverwrite);
00400     if (filename.isEmpty()) return;
00401     if (! filename.endsWith(".csv")) filename.append(".csv");
00402     QFileInfo fileInfo(filename);
00403     saveDirectory = fileInfo.absolutePath();
00404     saveFile = saveDirectory.filePath(filename);
00405     outFile = new QFile(saveFile);             // Open file for output
00408     if (outFile->exists())
00409     {
00410         if (! outFile->open(QIODevice::ReadOnly))
00411         {
00412             displayErrorMessage("Could not open output file to read");
00413             return;
00414         }
00415         outFile->close();
00416         if (! outFile->open(QIODevice::Append))
00417         {
00418             displayErrorMessage("Could not open output file to append");
00419             return;
00420         }
00421     }
00423     else
00424     {
00425         if (! outFile->open(QIODevice::WriteOnly))
00426         {
00427             displayErrorMessage("Could not open the output file");
00428             return;
00429         }
00430         qDebug() << "Save File Created";
00431     }
00432     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.downloadButton->setEnabled(true);
00433     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.closeFileButton->setEnabled(true);
00434 }
00435 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00438 void BatteryChargerControl::on_closeFileButton_clicked()
00439 {
00440     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.errorLabel->clear();
00441     if (saveFile.isEmpty())
00442         displayErrorMessage("File already closed");
00443     else
00444     {
00445         outFile->close();
00446         delete outFile;
00448         saveFile = QString();
00449         qDebug() << "Save File Closed";
00451         solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.downloadButton->setEnabled(false);
00452         solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.closeFileButton->setEnabled(false);
00453     }
00454 }
00455 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00461 void BatteryChargerControl::displayErrorMessage(const QString message)
00462 {
00463     solarRegulatorControlDialogUi.errorLabel->setText(message);
00464 }
00465 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00470 bool BatteryChargerControl::success()
00471 {
00472     return synchronized;
00473 }
00474 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00480 QString BatteryChargerControl::error()
00481 {
00482     return errorMessage;
00483 }
